fields.name: Tutorial – Loops
fields.description: At the Mage Citadel: Write a loop to extinguish 5 candles on the Water Isles.

fields.name: Tutorial – Conditionals
fields.description: At the Mage Citadel: Use if/else to navigate the mist in the Sky Spires.

fields.name: Tutorial – Recursion
fields.description: At the Mage Citadel: Create recursive functions to conquer the Crimson Sands.

fields.name: Tutorial – Data Structures
fields.description: At the Mage Citadel: Store lock data in a dictionary and unlock them.

fields.name: Loop the Fires
fields.description: Build a loop to extinguish scattered fires in the Water Isles.

fields.name: Rainmaker
fields.description: Write a function that summons rain 3 times, increasing its intensity each time.

fields.name: Filter the Debris
fields.description: From an array of streams, filter only those with volume > threshold.

fields.name: Wave Pattern
fields.description: Create nested loops to generate alternating waves of varying heights.

fields.name: Matrix Flood
fields.description: Implement a recursive flood-fill on a height matrix to simulate a flood.

fields.name: Rain Collector
fields.description: Build a dictionary that counts rainfall occurrences in each map section.

fields.name: Water Sort
fields.description: Sort an array of water volumes from smallest to largest.

fields.name: Stream Merge
fields.description: Merge two sorted lists of water currents into one sorted list.

fields.name: Path Finder
fields.description: Use BFS to find the shortest path through the network of water channels.

fields.name: Loopcasting
fields.description: Create a loop that combines multiple water elements and casts them sequentially.

fields.name: Gale Launch
fields.description: Write a loop to launch 4 floating objects into the air.

fields.name: Conditional Winds
fields.description: If wind > threshold, disperse clouds; otherwise, create a storm.

fields.name: Wind Array
fields.description: Store an array of wind speeds and find its maximum value.

fields.name: Nested Gusts
fields.description: Build nested loops to summon multiple gusts of varying strength.

fields.name: Recursive Soar
fields.description: Write a recursive function to lift an object to a specified height.

fields.name: Wind Sort
fields.description: Sort a list of wind pressures using a sorting algorithm.

fields.name: Flow Map
fields.description: Use BFS to chart the wind path from point A to B.

fields.name: Gale Sort
fields.description: Implement quicksort on wind intensity readings.

fields.name: Stream Merge Air
fields.description: Merge two sorted lists of wind records and keep the result sorted.

fields.name: Air Matrix
fields.description: Flood-fill a 2D matrix of wind currents.

fields.name: Sand Spikes
fields.description: Use a simple loop to erect columns of earth.

fields.name: Conditional Quarry
fields.description: If depth > threshold, dig a trench; otherwise, build a mound.

fields.name: Array Foundations
fields.description: Build an array of stone blocks and record their sizes.

fields.name: Nested Mounds
fields.description: Create nested loops to build multiple mounds.

fields.name: Recursive Pillars
fields.description: Write a recursive function to erect earth pillars of varying heights.

fields.name: Sand Sort
fields.description: Implement merge sort on grains of sand.

fields.name: Path in Dunes
fields.description: Find the shortest path through sand dunes using BFS.

fields.name: Array Merge Earth
fields.description: Merge two arrays of dune heights into a sorted array.

fields.name: Earth Matrix Fill
fields.description: Flood-fill a matrix of earth to fill pits.

fields.name: Terrain Generator
fields.description: Implement Perlin noise to generate rugged terrain.

fields.name: Spark Burst
fields.description: Loop to cast 6 fire sparks.

fields.name: Conditional Blaze
fields.description: If fuel > threshold, create an inferno; otherwise, cast a spark.

fields.name: Flame Array
fields.description: Build an array of flames and find the largest one.

fields.name: Nested Explosions
fields.description: Create nested loops to trigger several explosions in succession.

fields.name: Recursive Inferno
fields.description: Write a recursive function to spread flames flood-like.

fields.name: Fire Sort
fields.description: Implement heap sort on fire particles.

fields.name: Blaze Path
fields.description: Discover the shortest route through the fire cave using Dijkstra.

fields.name: Fire Merge
fields.description: Merge two arrays of flame intensities into a sorted array.

fields.name: Volcano Simulation
fields.description: Flood-fill a lava matrix to simulate a flowing path.

fields.name: Inferno Recursion
fields.description: Combine recursive calls to generate cascading explosions.

fields.name: Citadel – Composite Patterns
fields.description: Combine loops and conditionals to activate three pillars in parallel.

fields.name: Citadel – Algorithm Gauntlet
fields.description: Write a recursive function that steps through an array of commands.

fields.name: Citadel – Element Fusion
fields.description: Nest loops to blend four elements under complex conditions.

fields.name: Citadel – Data Cascade
fields.description: Build and traverse a tree data structure to store elemental combos.

fields.name: Citadel – Mastery Final
fields.description: Solve a harmonized puzzle using loops, conditionals, and recursion to restore elemental balance.

fields.name: Citadel – Ultimate Fusion
fields.description: Write an optimized composite algorithm to weight all four elements dynamically.
